'''''melme''''' is a [[Quenya]] noun meaning "love".<ref name=Ety>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 372</ref>

[[Helge Fauskanger]] has suggested the form ''melmë'', to conform with the spelling of Quenya used in ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.<ref>{{webcite|author=[[Helge Fauskanger]]|articleurl=http://folk.uib.no/hnohf/eng-quen.rtf|articlename=English-Quenya Wordlist (Quettaparma Quenyanna)|dated=|website=Arda|accessed=14 September 2013}}</ref>

==Etymology==
